summary: BIK files in 1080p as BGS_Logo replacer to be used with BOBONATOR2s mod Better Skyrim Intro
descriptionHtml:
Thanks to BOBONATOR2 for the idea and the original mod: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18970

I recoded the live trailer since I was not too happy with the encoding artifacts in the original UHQ file from https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18970.  This is 5 versions of diffrent length, all in 1080p: 5s, 10s, 15s, 30s and 60s.
author: Bethesda
